reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes goes too fast. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Assignments can be time-consuming.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Incorporates real-world examples in lectures.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Difficult to follow. Needs to provide more practice problems.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful discussions. Heavy reading load but worth it.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Dry lectures, but very knowledgeable. Fair grader.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Excellent at breaking down complex concepts. Great lab instructor.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Encourages class participation.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Field trips were a highlight.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Disorganized lectures. Unclear expectations for assignments.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging content. Group projects were challenging but educational.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but can be abstract. Grading is fair.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Incredibly knowledgeable and approachable. Best professor I've had.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Practical approach to teaching. Great industry connections.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but lectures can be monotonous.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Challenging course, but professor is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Brilliant researcher and teacher. Makes complex topics accessible.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but poor communication skills. Assignments are unclear.
